alert.note: Alert for Huerfano County Including Walsenburg (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 06 at 2:52PM MDT until April 07 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 229... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Friday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 229. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Impacts...Conditions may be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
